TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RelativeSource extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class RelativeSource Inherits MarkupExtension Implements ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 实现一个标记扩展，该扩展描述相对于绑定目标位置的绑定源位置。

span.span: Implements a markup extension that describes the location of the binding source relative to the position of the binding target.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定绑定源的方式之一是使用属性。One of the ways to specify a binding source is to use the property. 这是该属性的属性类型。This is the property type of that property. 同时是标记扩展实现和数据对象。 is simultaneously a markup extension implementation and a data object. 当扩展返回本身 (请参阅)，数据中包含的相关信息。When the extension returns itself (see ), the relevant information is contained in the data. 标记扩展的主要用途是允许在属性窗体中使用变量参数的构造函数语法，以便模式可以是以内联方式定义使用上级节点类型和其他模式不需要的级别的两个额外自变量。The main purpose of the markup extension is to allow a variable-argument constructor syntax in attribute form, so that the mode can be defined inline with the two extra arguments for ancestor type and level that the other modes do not require. 有关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]信息，请参阅[RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示创建样式触发器报告验证错误消息。The following example shows a style trigger that creates a that reports a validation error message. 使用属性，属性 setter 的值将绑定到当前的错误内容(使用样式)。Using the property, the value of the setter binds to the error content of the current (the using the style). 此示例的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 实现绑定验证](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md)。For more information on this example, see [How to: Implement Binding Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md). [!code-xaml[BindValidation#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindValidation/CSharp/Window1.xaml#5)] 下面的示例演示定义自定义控件调用`NumericUpDown`。The following example shows the definition of a custom control called `NumericUpDown`. 属性绑定到`Value`的对象的`TemplatedParent`，即`NumericUpDown`控制此应用于在这种情况下。The property of the is bound to the `Value` of the object that is the `TemplatedParent`, which is the `NumericUpDown` control that this is applied to in this case. [!code-xaml[CustomControlNumericUpDown#RelativeSource](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CustomControlNumericUpDown/CSharp/CustomControlLibrary/themes/generic.xaml#relativesource)] 有关完整的示例，请参阅[主题和 UI 自动化支持示例的 NumericUpDown 自定义控件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160025)。For the complete sample, see [NumericUpDown Custom Control with Theme and UI Automation Support Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160025). 下面的示例返回第二个遇到向上路径开始的绑定目标元素上。The following returns the second encountered on the upward path starting at the target element of the binding. [!code-csharp[BindConversion#RelativeSource](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindConversion/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#relativesource)] [!code-vb[BindConversion#RelativeSource](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindConversion/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#relativesource)]

span.span: One of the values.

The of ancestor to look for.

param.span: 所有给定类型的上级节点中所需的上级节点的序号位置。

span.span: The ordinal position of the desired ancestor among all ancestors of the given type.

summary.span: 用初始模式以及其他用于查找所需相对源的树遍历限定符初始化 类的一个新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with an initial mode and additional tree-walking qualifiers for finding the desired relative source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ancestorType` 和`ancestorLevel`不有任何关系，如果以参数形式给出`mode`以外。`ancestorType` and `ancestorLevel` have no relevance if given as parameters for a `mode` other than . 其他不使用此签名值。Do not use this signature for the other values. ## Examples 下面的示例返回第二个遇到向上路径开始的绑定目标元素上。The following returns the second encountered on the upward path starting at the target element of the binding. [!code-csharp[BindConversion#RelativeSource](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindConversion/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#relativesource)] [!code-vb[BindConversion#RelativeSource](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindConversion/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#relativesource)]

summary.span: 以 模式获取或设置要查找的上级级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the level of ancestor to look for, in mode.

summary.span: 使用 1 指示最靠近绑定目标元素的项。

span.span: Use 1 to indicate the one nearest to the binding target element.
The ancestor level.

value.span: 使用 1 指示最靠近绑定目标元素的项。

span.span: Use 1 to indicate the one nearest to the binding target element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性未显式设置，设置或属性将会隐式锁定属性值设置为。If the property is not set explicitly, setting the or the property will implicitly lock the property value to . ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 有关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]信息，请参阅[RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md). ## Examples 下面的示例返回第二个遇到向上路径开始的绑定目标元素上。The following returns the second encountered on the upward path starting at the target element of the binding. [!code-csharp[BindConversion#RelativeSource](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindConversion/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#relativesource)] [!code-vb[BindConversion#RelativeSource](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindConversion/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#relativesource)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 值，该值描述相对于绑定目标的位置的绑定源的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that describes the location of the binding source relative to the position of the binding target.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性在初始化后是只读的。This property is read-only after initialization. 如果未显式设置此属性，则将设置或和属性隐式将锁定此属性值设置为。If this property is not set explicitly, setting the or the and the properties will implicitly lock this property value to . ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 有关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]信息，请参阅[RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md).

exception.span: 此属性在初始化后不可变。

span.span: This property is immutable after initialization.

exception.span: 不要对此实例更改 ，而应创建一个新的 或使用其他静态实例。

span.span: Instead of changing the on this instance, create a new or use a different static instance.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property PreviousData As RelativeSource
public: static property System::Windows::Data::RelativeSource ^ PreviousData { System::Windows::Data::RelativeSource ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个静态值，该值用于返回为 模式构造的 。

span.span: Gets a static value that is used to return a constructed for the mode.
A static .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 三个四个值， ， ，或，可以生成，是完全是静态的包含任何唯一的私有值。Three of the four values, , , or , can produce a that is wholly static, containing no unique private values. 所有使用静态属性可以都共享同一个对象，不再需要为每次使用分配单独的对象。All uses of the static property can share the same object, eliminating the need to allocate separate objects for each use. 因此，使用静态属性，减少内存使用量。Therefore, using the static property reduces memory usage. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 有关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]信息，请参阅[RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同时是标记扩展实现和数据对象。 is simultaneously a markup extension implementation and a data object. 当扩展返回本身时，数据中包含的相关信息。When the extension returns itself, the relevant information is contained in the data. 标记扩展的主要用途是允许在属性窗体中使用变量参数的构造函数语法，以便模式可以是定义以内联方式上级节点类型和其他模式不需要的级别的两个额外参数。The main purpose of the markup extension is to allow a variable-argument constructor syntax in attribute form so that the mode can be defined inline, with the two extra arguments for ancestor type and level that the other modes do not require.

Setter 的值将绑定到当前的错误内容(使用样式) 使用属性。The value of the setter binds to the error content of the current (the using the style) using the property. 请参阅[如何： 实现绑定验证](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md)有关此示例的详细信息。See [How to: Implement Binding Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md) for more information on this example. summary.span: 指示是否应保持 属性。

span.span: Indicates whether the property should be persisted.

returns.span: 如果属性值已更改，不再是默认值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这`ShouldSerialize`提供方法，因为属性不具有简单的默认值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 此方法指示属性是否已从其默认值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 如果你也正在开发的设计器通常调用此方法或开发你自己的控件包含。You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the or developing your own control incorporating the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这`ShouldSerialize`提供方法，因为属性不具有简单的默认值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 此方法指示属性是否已从其默认值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 如果你也正在开发的设计器通常调用此方法或开发你自己的控件包含。You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the or developing your own control incorporating the . 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 ShouldSerialize 和重置方法定义默认值](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/defining-default-values-with-the-shouldserialize-and-reset-methods.md)。For more information, see [Defining Default Values with the ShouldSerialize and Reset Methods](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/defining-default-values-with-the-shouldserialize-and-reset-methods.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 三个四个值， ， ，或，可以生成，是完全是静态的包含任何唯一的私有值。Three of the four values, , , or , can produce a that is wholly static, containing no unique private values. 所有使用静态属性可以都共享同一个对象，不再需要为每次使用分配单独的对象。All uses of the static property can share the same object, eliminating the need to allocate separate objects for each use. 因此，使用静态属性，减少内存使用量。Therefore, using the static property reduces memory usage. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 有关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]信息，请参阅[RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示定义自定义控件调用`NumericUpDown`。The following example shows the definition of a custom control called `NumericUpDown`. 属性绑定到`Value`的对象的`TemplatedParent`，即`NumericUpDown`控制此应用于在这种情况下。The property of the is bound to the `Value` of the object that is the `TemplatedParent`, which is the `NumericUpDown` control that this is applied to in this case. [!code-xaml[CustomControlNumericUpDown#RelativeSource](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CustomControlNumericUpDown/CSharp/CustomControlLibrary/themes/generic.xaml#relativesource)] 有关完整的示例，请参阅[主题和 UI 自动化支持示例的 NumericUpDown 自定义控件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160025)。For the complete sample, see [NumericUpDown Custom Control with Theme and UI Automation Support Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160025).
